content.rendered:
[vc_row row_content_width=”grid” content_text_aligment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1614880518956{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column]

Modern & Sustainable Solutions

Esplanade App

[vc_column_text]

Our numerous technological solutions will make your stay at the Esplanade Zagreb Hotel smoother and more diverting. Stay connected using the free superfast wireless internet in any area of the hotel or on the terrace, straightforwardly and without a password. Download the specially designed hotel application for your smartphone and peruse the hotel news, find out more about the latest promotions, browse the attractive menu and wine list, and order room service with just a few clicks. Use the remote control which is integrated with the app to easily choose channels and other hotel content on the smart television in your room. With the help of the Hoteza IPTV system, you can also access your Netflix account or work easily using the Screen Sharing app.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”28px”] APPLE GOOGLE PLAY [vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” el_class=”pairpicture”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″]

$

$
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” content_text_aligment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1662544885711{margin-top: 60px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 120px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

 Having in mind ecological awareness in business, The Esplanade Zagreb Hotel proudly keeps abreast of the latest global trends and standards in the implementation of the newest technologies.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

[/vc_column][/vc_row]
